::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon walked away, and looked around.  He walked around the ship,
taking a little tour, and then he found the place that he decided would be
his quarters.  He looked at himself.  He was tired and weak.  He went to a
sink and drank some cold water.  Ah, so fresh.  Fresh, ice cold water. 
Right now, right here, he was drinking fresh, ice cold water.  He longed
for water, and now here it was.  After having some water, he went back to
his quarters.  He stood around for a bit, and then later curled up and went
to sleep.
